name: Jump Shot Pro Basketball Retro Simulation
name_original: Jump Shot Pro Basketball Retro Simulation
description:
Run your own pro basketball franchise as owner, general manager, or head coach. Jump Shot Pro Basketball allows you to accurately simulate NBA basketball games. Complete customization allows you to create your own league, teams, and players. Play unlimited seasons with franchise mode. Rebuild through the draft, negotiate with free agents, control ticket prices, and more.

  • Create the ultimate pro dynasty with the FULL version of our basketball game
  • 23 seasons of NBA basketball players and teams from the 1988-1989 season to the 2010-2011 season
    • This game is being released as is. The final version was way back in 2012.
    • This means 2012 NBA salary cap rules, league formats, team names, cities and arenas.
    • The game doesn't resize so it will be a little difficult to read in 4K resolution.
    • Should still run well though and additional seasons can be imported and created
